title: Week Zero Preview
description:
Jason Fitz, Desmond Howard and David Pollack take a deep drive into games happening worldwide in week zero and which teams will have a harder schedule to bounce back from. Plus, Allen Greene exits as Auburn's athletic director. Also, is Casey Thompson the luck that Scott Frost needs to stay in Nebraska?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The crew previews tomorrow's games and which team's Athletic Director is leaving
